articles.title: "My Mindset Was To...": Mohammed Shami On Bowling Strategy In 1st ODI vs Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Australia: Mohammed Shami returned with figures of 3 for 17 on Friday. He said it is important to clinch the momentum at the right time in venues like the Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai.
articles.content: The moment Mohammad Shami bowled the first ball of his second spell, it felt as if everything has fallen in place. KL Rahul and Ravindra Jadeja's star turn with the bat might have got India a five-wi… [+3823 chars]
